articles.content: Ever since Samantha Akkineni’s separation from Naga Chaitanya, the actress has been sharing inspirational quotes on her social media handles. The South superstar is slowly and steadily trying to move… [+1675 chars]

articles.title: Why Moderna Is the Biggest Winner From COVID Boosters So Far - Motley Fool
articles.description: Some Americans could prefer Moderna's booster because of perceptions that it offers higher efficacy.
articles.content: It's been roughly three and a half months since the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) authorized boosters for the COVID-19 vaccine developed by Pfizer( PFE 2.32% ) and BioNTech( BNTX 3.17% ) fo… [+4112 chars]

articles.title: Total solar eclipse seen from Union Glacier, Antarctica - Africanews English
articles.description:
A total solar eclipse could be seen from Antarctica on Saturday with NASA live streaming the event, showing a striking image of the sky darkening.
Those living in southern parts of Africa, Australia and South America could also witness a partial solar eclipse.
